meanings.definition: frizes (noun): a horizontal band of decoration or sculpture on a building
meanings.sent1: The frizes on the old building were beautifully carved.
meanings.sent2: The frizes added an elegant touch to the architecture.
meanings.sent3: The frizes on the museum made the building look like a work of art.
meanings.sent4: The frizes seemed to dance along the walls of the historic structure.
meanings.sent5: The intricate frizes captured the attention of all who passed by.

meanings.definition: frizes (verb): to decorate with a horizontal band of sculpture or ornamentation
meanings.sent1: She carefully frizes the walls of her home with delicate patterns.
meanings.sent2: The artist frizes the columns of the temple with intricate designs.
meanings.sent3: He decided to frizes his car with colorful stickers for a fun look.
meanings.sent4: The decorator frizes the room with a touch of elegance and style.
meanings.sent5: The gardener frizes the garden path with beautiful flowers and stones.
